name: Zero Carbon, Zero Tolerance
description:
Deadlier than a Exocet, quieter than a mosquito in a vacuum, more environmentally-friendly than the solar-powered yacht that ferried Greta Thunberg across the Atlantic. 

The world has been taken over by big oil and private jets, which are contributing to irreversible climate change and threatening the very future of life on this planet. Take control of a specially-built glider equipped with a (solar-powered) laser gun and fuelled by nothing but the hopes and dreams of unborn generations. 

Controls

W: Up

A: Left

S: Down

D: Right

Space / Left Mouse Button: Fire

Esc: Pause
